the Github repository
.


All examples support hot reloading and REPL debugging via 
Figwheel
.

docs.title: Shopping Cart

docs.text:
Documentation


Project uses 
MkDocs
 to generate documentation static site.


Serve site without examples locally with automatic build: 
mkdocs serve


Build site without examples into site folder: 
mkdocs build --clean


Build site with examples (requires 
PyInvoke
): 
inv site


Deploying


Deploy to Clojars: 
lein deploy clojars


Deploy site to gh-pages branch: 
ghp-import -p site
docs.title: Developer Guide
